getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.brokers: The brokers to update drf reward

EXCHANGE_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the exchange role

PAUSER_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the pauser role

REWARD_EXECUTE_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the reward execute role

TOKEN_DECIMAL_DIFF.details: The token contract decimals diff with contract decimals

ContractParamsUpdate(address,address,add.notice: Emitted when params of contract updates

DrfRewardBalanceUpdate(uint8,address,int.notice: Emitted when broker DRF reward balance updates

DrfRewardPoolUpdate(uint8,int256,uint256.notice: Emitted when DRF reward pool updates

UsdRewardBalanceUpdate(uint8,address,add.notice: Emitted when broker USD reward balance updates

UsdRewardPoolUpdate(uint8,int256,uint256.notice: Emitted when USD reward pool updates

addBrokerReward(address,address,uint256).notice: Add broker reward by trader's trading fee

brokerApplyNumber().notice: Get brokerApplyNumber, the eDRF number to apply broker

brokerValidUnitNumber().notice: Get brokerValidUnitNumber, the eDRF number to extend valid period of broker in day

burnEdrfExtendValidPeriod(uint256).notice: Extend valid period of broker to burn edrf

claimDrfReward().notice: Claim broker DRF reward from CommunityVestingVault

getBrokerInfo(address).notice: Get broker info of a broker

initialBrokersForUpgrade(address[],uint2.notice: Initial brokers by last version of contract for upgrade
